[Chair Storage](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1360)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 71</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents also have access to all assistive items from Morhen’s Mobility Apparel_

**Price** 1 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The chair has an efficient allocated space to hold additional items. This reduces the amount of Bulk the items weigh when stored within the chair, much like a [backpack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=4). The first 2 Bulk of items stowed in your chair don't count against your Bulk limit. If you use both chair storage and a backpack at the same time, only 2 Bulk total isn't counted against your limit, much like if you used multiple backpacks or similar items at the same time.
